channel.title: Bash Prompt on
channel.description: Recent content in Bash Prompt on

item.title: Spice up your bash prompt
item.description: I spend a lot of my time sitting in front of terminals if you have not yet guessed. When dealing with different user accounts across different systems and a plethora of terminals open its nice to have a bit of information about who you are, and where you are. I also like to be able to easily differentiate output from different commands. If your interested read on.
